column4: anyone? I need help with a secondary ethernet card which isn't working...the dmesg posted here : http://paste.ubuntu.com/16054/
what exactly is ur problem...no detection?
that was the issue until now.. but now that it's detected, and after I've configured the ip add and all.. it still isn't allowing me to connect to my lan
how are you trying to connect to your lan?
basically I just wanna connect to the dc++ hubs and CS servers.. using a realtek ethernet card..i'm using the onboard ethernet card to connect to the net.. given by a different ISP
dpaste.com me the output of you ifconfig command
okies
http://paste.ubuntu.com/16056/
how is eth1 suppose to get ip address
dynamically?
didn't understand you..
oh noo.. fixed ip..
how are ip addresses assigned to eth1 , dynamially?   if so, did you run dhclient?
i thought you were not able to connect, or is it that you connection routinely times out?
no it doesn't time out ... very rarely.. like once in a bluemoon..
so ur having connection problems?
nopes.. this card is only for my lan..so that i can play CS with my pals and all.. i don't use it for internet...i use the onboard lancard for internet provided by a ISP
so you cannot connect to you CS servers?
and CS server is the only thing that is connected to you eth1?
i can't connect to anyone on my lan.. no dc++ hubs.. no nothing.
i don't know
